title: ”Natural heritage site” shall include, natural sites or precisely delineated natural areas which are of outstanding value from the point of view of science, heritage conservation or natural beauty; geological and physiographical formations and precisely delineated areas which constitute the habitat of threatened species of animals and plants and are of outstanding value from the point of view of ecology or conservation; natural features consisting of physical and biological formations or groups of such formations, which are of outstanding (special) value from the aesthetic or scientific point of view
clause_text: ”Natural heritage site” shall include, natural sites or precisely delineated natural areas which are of outstanding value from the point of view of science, heritage conservation or natural beauty; geological and physiographical formations and precisely delineated areas which constitute the habitat of threatened species of animals and plants and are of outstanding value from the point of view of ecology or conservation; natural features consisting of physical and biological formations or groups of such formations, which are of outstanding (special) value from the aesthetic or scientific point of view.
